abstract: Treasury Secretary Timothy Geithner's comments today that there is "absolutely" no chance that another U.S. financial institution would fail was music to Morgan Stanley and other bank stocks.
snippet: Treasury Secretary Timothy Geithner's comments today that there is "absolutely" no chance that another U.S. financial institution would fail was music to Morgan Stanley and other bank stocks.

headline.main: Bank Stocks Get a Boost From Geithner
